slides.title: Window Functions
slides.content:
# Window Functions ğŸªŸ

## Key Functions

| Function | Use |
|----------|-----|
| ROW_NUMBER() | Unique sequence |
| RANK() | Ranking with gaps |
| SUM() OVER | Running totals |
| LAG/LEAD | Previous/next row |
